p.d: At the age of 23 she published "Qumran", an international best-seller. A woman of combats and struggles, she is the sort of author with no fear of taboo subjects, those that others are scared of tackling, worried that they might lack delicacy or precision. Today Éliette Abécassis presents "Nos Rendez-vous". Presented by: Thierry Bellefroid.
